title: Bug 120315 - Incorrect display property behavior in new pdf emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new pdf emitter, it does not take effect as expected.
OB: Currently, when the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new pdf emitter, it is still visible in the generated PDF.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new pdf emitter, it should be hidden and not visible in the generated PDF.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Create a new PDF emitter. 
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'. 
3. Generate the PDF and observe that the item is still visible in the output.
